title: Does riot not care about Brand?
body: It's pretty well known that for quite a few patches, Brand's ultimate Pyroclasm has a tendency to not bounce, for example if you toss the R onto an enemy champion in the middle of a minion wave, 1/3 times the ult will dissipate after the initial hit. This bug is beyond game breaking, but it seems like its simply being ignored over and over.{{champion:63}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey guys! 

So, this definitely isn't in the realm of skins, so I don't have a ton of context here, but wanted to pop in and let you know that I've gone ahead and checked the status of this issue. 

It's a known issue on our end. It appears that it'll be resolved in patch 6.3 if all goes according to plan!
Thanks for acknowledging the thread. It's really frustrating to us who enjoy brand quite a bit, when we hear some champions get quickfixes whilst our favorite candlestick keeps getting snubbed.

This bug happens at-least 4-5 times a game if you play him Middle.  Riot has completely ignored 15 threads on this topic (Because hardly anyone plays him/not a top priority). I've started solely playing him bot lane to counter this bug.
I play a decent amount of Brand support and have not encountered this bug. Unless it's something that has occured recently cause I probably haven't played him in two weeks.
Try running a game as mid brand or two. You'll definately experience it.
